parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: See! Lo! Behold! Look! Second person singular imperative middle voice of eido; used as imperative lo!

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To come, go.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A cloud. From nephos; properly, cloudiness, i.e. a cloud.
And, even, also, namely.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The eye; fig: the mind's eye. From optanomai; the eye; by implication, vision; figuratively, envy.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Whosoever, whichsoever, whatsoever.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To pierce through (or deeply), transfix. From ek and the base of kentron; to transfix.

str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A tribe or race of people. From phuo; an offshoot, i.e. Race or clan.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Contracted from a primary word; soil; by extension a region, or the solid part or the whole of the terrene globe.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A primary verb; to 'chop'; specially, to beat the breast in grief.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Yes, certainly, even so. A primary particle of strong affirmation; yes.
Of Hebrew origin; properly, firm, i.e. trustworthy; adverbially, surely.
